welcome.title: Welcome to the Search Page
welcome.content: The Search page allows you to query all information published in the Clearing-House. Records can be found by typing a word in the free text search field and/or by using a combination of filters to narrow your search.

globalSearch.title: Global Filters
globalSearch.content: Global filters allow you to search the entire database through all record categories by selecting one or multiple options within the Record types, Keywords, Country, Regions and Date filters.

freeText.title: Free text search
freeText.content:
This search box allows you to query the entire database by typing word(s) of your choice.

Tip: Change the language of the website (top right corner) before typing in that language.

recordTypesFilterTab.title: Filter by Record Type
recordTypesFilterTab.content: Select one or more record types to search by specific category(ies) of records: National, Reference or SCBD.

keywordsFilterTab.title: Search by Keyword
keywordsFilterTab.content:
Select one or more keywords from the list.
If you have already filtered by record type, the keyword filters displayed will be applicable specifically to that record type.

countryFilterTab.title: Search by Country
countryFilterTab.content:
Select one or more countries from the list.

Tip: Click on a letter to view all countries that start with that letter. You can also filter by countries that are 'Parties', 'Non-Parties' and 'Ratified, not yet Party'.

regionFilterTab.title: Search by Region
regionFilterTab.content: Select from the pre-defined list of regions and/or regional groups.

dateFilterTab.title: Search by Date
dateFilterTab.content: The Date filter allows you to search for records published within (i) a pre-determined date range (e.g. “Last 7 Days”); or (ii) a date range that you can specify (“Custom Range”); or (iii) on a specific day of any year.

closeFilterTab.title: Search Results
closeFilterTab.content: To view search results, scroll down or click on the (x) button at the top right corner.

searchResult.title: Search Results: Tabs
searchResult.content:
Search results are displayed in separate tabs organized by record category. Click on a tab to view records associated with that category.

Note: The black circle indicates the total number of records in each category and will automatically change based on your search selections.

subFilters.title: Sub-filters
subFilters.content:
Sub-filters appear when you select one or more record types within the Record types global filter.
They appear on the left-hand side and are associated with each selected record type.
You can use sub-filters in combination with global filters to further narrow your search.

recordView.title: Search Results: Viewing Records
recordView.content: Once you locate the record of interest, click on it to view full details.

viewType.title: Search Results: View Type
viewType.content: You can change the display of records by selecting the preferred option from the drop-down list.

sortBy.title: Search Results: Sorting
sortBy.content: Sort your search results by selecting one or more fields.

sendRecords.title: Search Results: Share
sendRecords.content: Click here to share your search results.

exportRecords.title: Search Results: Export
exportRecords.content: Click here to export the information to a spreadsheet format.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.content: Click here to access contextual help where you can find more information related to the Search page.

needMoreHelp.title: Need more help?
needMoreHelp.content: Use the Chat feature to message us for additional support.
